author: MThawkwood

comments.content: It looks like Monotype's **[Matturra](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124316/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Matturra%20-%20Regular&fid=c2240de906b1a5c58f9698614712c28e&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=AmeriPak&fit=1)** [1992], emboldened, a bit compressed and with modified /i & /k (at least)
Fivos - just letting you know that the purchase links on your site don't work because the font is spelled Matura.

Thanks Mike...  
there was an older version called Matturra but it seems it's obsolete now ;)
